member.name: T:SharpConfig.Configuration
member.summary: Represents a configuration. Configurations contain one or multiple sections that in turn can contain one or multiple settings. The class is designed to work with classic configuration formats such as .ini and .cfg, but is not limited to these.

member.name: F:SharpConfig.Configuration.GlobalSectionName
member.summary: The name of the global section. The default value is "General".

member.name: M:SharpConfig.Configuration.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:SharpConfig.Configuration.GetEnumerator
member.summary: Gets an enumerator that iterates through the configuration.

member.name: M:SharpConfig.Configuration.System#Collections#IEnumerable#GetEnumerator
member.summary: Gets an enumerator that iterates through the configuration.

member.name: M:SharpConfig.Configuration.Add(SharpConfig.Section)
member.summary: Adds a section to the configuration.
member.param: The section to add.

member.name: M:SharpConfig.Configuration.Clear
member.summary: Clears the configuration of all sections but the global section.

member.name: M:SharpConfig.Configuration.Contains(SharpConfig.Section)
member.summary: Determines whether a specified section is contained in the configuration.
member.param: The section to check for containment.
member.returns: True if the section is contained in the configuration; false otherwise.

member.name: M:SharpConfig.Configuration.Remove(System.String)
member.summary: Removes a section from this section by its name.
member.param: The case-sensitive name of the section to remove.

member.name: M:SharpConfig.Configuration.Remove(SharpConfig.Section)
member.summary: Removes a section from the configuration.
member.param: The section to remove.

member.name: M:SharpConfig.Configuration.LoadFromFile(System.String)
member.summary: Loads a configuration from a file auto-detecting the encoding and using the default parsing settings.
member.param: The location of the configuration file.

member.name: M:SharpConfig.Configuration.LoadFromFile(System.String,System.Text.Encoding)
member.summary: Loads a configuration from a file.
member.param: The location of the configuration file.
The encoding applied to the contents of the file. Specify null to auto-detect the encoding.

member.name: M:SharpConfig.Configuration.LoadFromStream(System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Loads a configuration from a text stream auto-detecting the encoding and using the default parsing settings.
member.param: The text stream to load the configuration from.

member.summary: Loads a configuration from a text stream.
member.param: The text stream to load the configuration from.
The encoding applied to the contents of the stream. Specify null to auto-detect the encoding.

member.name: M:SharpConfig.Configuration.LoadFromText(System.String)
member.summary: Loads a configuration from text (source code).
member.param: The text (source code) of the configuration.

member.summary: Loads a configuration from a binary file using a specific reader.
member.param: The reader to use. Specify null to use the default reader.
The location of the configuration file.

member.summary: Loads a configuration from a binary stream, using a specific .
member.param: The reader to use. Specify null to use the default reader.
The stream to load the configuration from.

member.name: M:SharpConfig.Configuration.Save(System.String)
member.summary: Saves the configuration to a file using the default character encoding, which is UTF8.
member.param: The location of the configuration file.

member.summary: Saves the configuration to a file.
member.param: The location of the configuration file.
The character encoding to use. Specify null to use the default encoding, which is UTF8.

The writer to use. Specify null to use the default writer.

member.name: P:SharpConfig.Configuration.NumberFormat
member.summary: Gets or sets the number format that is used for value conversion in Section.GetValue(). The default value is CultureInfo.InvariantCulture.NumberFormat.

member.name: P:SharpConfig.Configuration.IsCaseSensitive
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether SharpConfig performs a case-sensitive search when searching for sections and settings.

member.name: P:SharpConfig.Configuration.ValidCommentChars
member.summary: Gets or sets the array that contains all comment delimiting characters.

member.name: P:SharpConfig.Configuration.GlobalSection
member.summary: Gets the global section in the configuration.

member.name: P:SharpConfig.Configuration.SectionCount
member.summary: Gets the number of sections that are in the configuration.

member.name: P:SharpConfig.Configuration.Item(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets or sets a section by index.
member.param: The index of the section in the configuration.

member.name: P:SharpConfig.Configuration.Item(System.String)
member.summary: Gets or sets a section by its name.
member.param: The name of the section.
member.returns: The section if found, otherwise a new section with the specified name is created, added to the configuration and returned.

member.name: T:SharpConfig.ConfigurationElement
member.summary: Represents the base class of all elements that exist in a , for example sections and settings.

member.summary: Gets or sets the name of this element.

member.name: P:SharpConfig.ConfigurationElement.Comment
member.summary: Gets or sets the comment of this element.

member.summary: Represents an error that occurred during the configuration parsing stage.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The name of the section.

member.name: M:SharpConfig.Section.CreateObject``1
member.summary: Creates an object of a specific type, and maps the settings in this section to the public properties of the object.
member.remarks: The specified type must have a public default constructor in order to be created.

member.name: M:SharpConfig.Section.MapTo``1(``0)
member.summary: Assigns the values of this section to an object's public properties.
member.param: The object that is modified based on the section.

member.name: M:SharpConfig.Section.MapTo``1(``0,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Assigns the values of this section to an object's public properties.
member.param: The object that is modified based on the section.
A value indicating whether a case-sensitive assignment is performed.

member.returns: A string that represents the current object.
